disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: The following architectural design is for general informational purposes only and does not constitute professional advice. Please consult with a certified architect or local building authority before proceeding.

rooms.name: entrance hall
rooms.description: Open entry area with natural light through glass doors, adheres to Vastu by facing east for auspicious welcome.

rooms.name: living room
rooms.description: Spacious room with floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural lighting and cross ventilation, oriented towards the south or west per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: dining area
rooms.description: Adjacent to living room, designed for natural light with a north-facing window, enhancing dining experience while following Vastu.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen layout placed in the southeast corner as per Vastu principles, featuring a central island and ample ventilation.

rooms.name: garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage integrated with direct access to outdoor space; designed for functionality with sliding doors and natural light.

rooms.name: utility room
rooms.description: Service area including storage and maintenance areas near the kitchen, located in a north-northwest zone as per Vastu norms.

openings.details: Glass doors with sidelights to let natural light in.
Large, floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant ventilation and light.
High, elongated window to maximize natural illumination.
Exhaust system with windows ensuring proper air circulation.

rooms.name: master bedroom
rooms.description: Large master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom; located in the northeast for prosperity as per Vastu guidelines, incorporating ample window space for natural light.

rooms.name: bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious secondary bedroom ensuring adequate daylight and privacy; located in the north.

rooms.name: bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with integrated study area; designed with large windows facing east or south per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: en-suite bathroom
rooms.description: For master bedroom, featuring modern fixtures, natural lighting and ventilation through strategically placed windows.

openings.details: Large window in the master bedroom to allow morning light.

vastu_guidelines: The design aligns with Vastu principles by orienting key rooms and openings optimally for natural light, air flow, and auspicious energy. For instance, living areas face south or west, kitchens in the southeast, master bedroom in northeast, etc.
local_building_norms: Design incorporates minimalistic aesthetics while ensuring compliance with local building codes, seismic considerations, and sustainable practices.
